TopicTitle: How to get the Here comes the kerbalry trophy

Articles.Content: How do i get to pop this achievement. I tried recovering a single crew member when floating in space a couple of times in different spots but it just wouldn’t unlock..

Are you in career mode? I'm sure I got that one for a rescue contract.

Makes sense needs to be a rescue.

No, I was in sandbox. I unlocked it in previous version in a sandbox game and figured it wouldn’t require a career game..

Thanks I’ll give it a shot

I got it just by getting close to the Kerbal needing to be rescued.

I was in Career mode PS4.
